long_description: With an ultra-cushy 3.5-inch thickness and soft fabric upper surface, the self-inflating REI Camp Bed 3.5 Sleeping Pad provides plush sleeping comfort wherever you decide to rest. Horizontally cored foam is engineered to be lightweight and compressible without compromising warmth. Dual quick-closing, high-volume-airflow valves allow the pad to self-inflate and deflate quickly. Durable 150-denier polyester bottom surface resists wear. R-value equals 6.0; most sleeping pads REI sells range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). REI Camp Bed 3.5 Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack for easy storing and packing.
short_description: With an ultra-cushy 3.5-inch thickness and soft fabric upper surface, the self-inflating REI Camp Bed 3.5 Sleeping Pad provides plush sleeping comfort wherever you decide to rest.
